languages.text: "Согласно поправке 3-С/8, внесенной префектусом Эстинией II Даргонусской, одна из печатей обязана храниться во дворце властителя протектората фон Валанциус, оставаясь символом нерушимой связи между священным Патентом и Адептус Администратум".

traits.locale_text: "Согласно поправке 3-С/8, внесенной префектусом Эстинией II Даргонусской, одна из печатей обязана храниться во дворце властителя протектората фон Валанциус, оставаясь символом нерушимой связи между священным Патентом и Адептус Администратум".
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "According to Amendment 3-C/8, implemented by Prefectus Estinia II of Dargonus, one of the seals must be kept in the palace of the ruler of the von Valancius protectorate, remaining a symbol of the unbreakable link between the sacred Warrant and the Adeptus Administratum."
languages.original_text: "Согласно поправке 3-С/8, внесенной префектусом Эстинией II Даргонусской, одна из печатей обязана храниться во дворце властителя протектората фон Валанциус, оставаясь символом нерушимой связи между священным Патентом и Адептус Администратум".

traits.locale_text: "According to Amendment 3-C/8, implemented by Prefectus Estinia II of Dargonus, one of the seals must be kept in the palace of the ruler of the von Valancius protectorate, remaining a symbol of the unbreakable link between the sacred Warrant and the Adeptus Administratum."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "According to Amendment 3-C/8, implemented by Prefectus Estinia II of Dargonus, one of the seals must be kept in the palace of the ruler of the von Valancius protectorate, remaining a symbol of the unbreakable link between the sacred Warrant and the Adeptus Administratum."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "According to Amendment 3-C/8, implemented by Prefectus Estinia II of Dargonus, one of the seals must be kept in the palace of the ruler of the von Valancius protectorate, remaining a symbol of the unbreakable link between the sacred Warrant and the Adeptus Administratum."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "According to Amendment 3-C/8, implemented by Prefectus Estinia II of Dargonus, one of the seals must be kept in the palace of the ruler of the von Valancius protectorate, remaining a symbol of the unbreakable link between the sacred Warrant and the Adeptus Administratum."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: “根据达戈努斯行政官艾斯缇娜二世发布的3-C/8号修正案，其中一个印章必须保存在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的宫殿里，这象征着神圣的授状与帝国内政部之间牢不可破的联结。”
languages.original_text: "According to Amendment 3-C/8, implemented by Prefectus Estinia II of Dargonus, one of the seals must be kept in the palace of the ruler of the von Valancius protectorate, remaining a symbol of the unbreakable link between the sacred Warrant and the Adeptus Administratum."

traits.locale_text: “根据达戈努斯行政官艾斯缇娜二世发布的3-C/8号修正案，其中一个印章必须保存在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的宫殿里，这象征着神圣的许可证与帝国内政部之间牢不可破的联结。”
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: «Según la enmienda 3-C/8, implementada por la Prefectus Estinia II de Dargonus, uno de los sellos debe permanecer en el palacio de{mf|l| la} gobernante del protectorado von Valancius, como símbolo del vínculo inquebrantable entre la sagrada Patente y el Adeptus Administratum».
languages.original_text: "According to Amendment 3-C/8, implemented by Prefectus Estinia II of Dargonus, one of the seals must be kept in the palace of the ruler of the von Valancius protectorate, remaining a symbol of the unbreakable link between the sacred Warrant and the Adeptus Administratum."

traits.locale_text: «Según la enmienda 3-C/8, implementada por la Prefectus Estinia II de Dargonus, uno de los sellos debe permanecer en el palacio de{mf|l| la} gobernante del protectorado von Valancius, como símbolo del vínculo inquebrantable entre la sagrada Patente y el Adeptus Administratum».
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: 「ダルゴナスの総監エスティニア二世が行った修正条項3-C/8によりますと、『封ろうのひとつは統治者たるフォン・ヴァランシウス護民官の宮殿に置かなくてはならない。聖なる令状と帝国行政局の揺るがぬ結びつきを象徴するためである』とのことです」
languages.original_text: "According to Amendment 3-C/8, implemented by Prefectus Estinia II of Dargonus, one of the seals must be kept in the palace of the ruler of the von Valancius protectorate, remaining a symbol of the unbreakable link between the sacred Warrant and the Adeptus Administratum."

traits.locale_text: 「ダルゴナスの総監エスティニア二世が行った修正条項3-C/8によりますと、『封ろうのひとつは統治者たるフォン・ヴァランシウス護民官の宮殿に置かなくてはならない。聖なる令状と帝国行政局の揺るがぬ結びつきを象徴するためである』とのことです」
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: « En vertu de l'amendement 3-C/8, déposé par le prefectus Estinia II de Dargonus, l'un des sceaux doit être conservé dans le palais du dirigeant du protectorat von Valancius en guise de symbole du lien indéfectible unissant la lettre de marque sacrée à l'Adeptus Administratum. »
languages.original_text: "According to Amendment 3-C/8, implemented by Prefectus Estinia II of Dargonus, one of the seals must be kept in the palace of the ruler of the von Valancius protectorate, remaining a symbol of the unbreakable link between the sacred Warrant and the Adeptus Administratum."

traits.locale_text: « En vertu de l'amendement 3-C/8, déposé par le prefectus Estinia II de Dargonus, l'un des sceaux doit être conservé dans le palais du dirigeant du protectorat von Valancius en guise de symbole du lien indéfectible unissant la lettre de marque sacrée à l'Adeptus Administratum. »
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Gemäß Zusatz 3-C/8, implementiert durch Präfektus Estinia II. von Dargonus, muss eines der Siegel im Palast des Oberhaupts des Protektorats von Valancius aufbewahrt werden, als Symbol der unerschütterlichen Verbindung zwischen dem heiligen Handelsbrief und dem Adeptus Administratum."
languages.original_text: "According to Amendment 3-C/8, implemented by Prefectus Estinia II of Dargonus, one of the seals must be kept in the palace of the ruler of the von Valancius protectorate, remaining a symbol of the unbreakable link between the sacred Warrant and the Adeptus Administratum."

traits.locale_text: "Gemäß Zusatz 3-C/8, implementiert durch Präfektus Estinia II. von Dargonus, muss eines der Siegel im Palast des Oberhaupts des Protektorats von Valancius aufbewahrt werden, als Symbol der unerschütterlichen Verbindung zwischen dem heiligen Handelsbrief und dem Adeptus Administratum."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Dargonuslu Prefektus II. Estinia'nın yürürlüğe koyduğu 3-C/8 Sayılı Değişiklik uyarınca, kutsal Ruhsatname ile Adeptus Administratum arasındaki kırılmaz bağın bir sembolü olarak mühürlerden biri, von Valancius protektorasının hükümdarının sarayında tutulmalıdır."
languages.original_text: "According to Amendment 3-C/8, implemented by Prefectus Estinia II of Dargonus, one of the seals must be kept in the palace of the ruler of the von Valancius protectorate, remaining a symbol of the unbreakable link between the sacred Warrant and the Adeptus Administratum."

traits.locale_text: "Dargonuslu Prefectus II. Estinia'nın yürürlüğe koyduğu 3-C/8 Numaralı Değişiklik uyarınca, kutsal Ruhsatname ile Adeptus Administratum arasındaki kırılmaz bağın bir sembolü olarak mühürlerden biri, von Valancius protektorasının hükümdarının sarayında tutulmalıdır."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals
